definition: to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey
to grieve to death/to die of a broken-heart
to lead to death/to result in death

sentences.english: Duggan, a father of four, died of a single gunshot wound to the chest, an inquest at north London Coroner's Court heard on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 驗屍報告稱，這位四歲小孩的父親被槍擊中胸腔致死。

sentences.english: A lot of them were persecuted and tortured to death by their political opponents.
sentences.chinese: 許多人被他們的政敵迫害致死。

sentences.english: The females were able to kill hosts by stings.
sentences.chinese: 而且成蜂取食能夠致死寄主。

sentences.english: Thanks to the cracks, the fish in the lake don't die from the lack of oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 也多虧了裂縫，湖裏的魚纔不會缺氧致死。

sentences.english: As the main human oral absorption by poisoning, lethal dose of 10 to 5 milliliters.
sentences.chinese: 人類主經經口服吸收中毒，致死量爲10～5毫升。

sentences.english: Samples from the other three suspected fatal cases could not be obtained .
sentences.chinese: 無法從其他三名疑似致死病例身上獲得樣本。

sentences.english: Regarding compensation for a man crushed to death by a falling fork-lift truck.
sentences.chinese: 關於一個工人被趺下來的剷車致死的賠償。

sentences.english: And half lethal dose was several hundred folds than the clinical dose.
sentences.chinese: 半數致死量是推薦臨牀劑量的幾百倍。

sentences.english: They tortured the prisoner to death.
China detains chief suspect in steel exec's death.
sentences.chinese: 涉嫌毆打通話鋼廠總經理致死的嫌犯在長春被捕。

sentences.english: In addition, deltamethrin caused the death or shortened, the body-length of the larvae.
sentences.chinese: 溴氰菊酯致死的部分中華按蚊幼蟲體長縮短。

sentences.english: The bite of a mad dog is fatal.
They have very high mortality rates. They are sort of the doomsday-scenario bugs.
sentences.chinese: 他們有很高的致死率，他們是那種世界末日病菌。

sentences.english: The case-fatality percentages were higher in the highly polluted areas.
sentences.chinese: 致死病例的百分比，在重污染區較多。

sentences.english: Two families have filed wrongful death suits against the company.
sentences.chinese: 有兩個家庭已經向麥賽能源公司提起意外致死訴訟。

sentences.english: Too much sitting, by the way, can kill.
sentences.chinese: 順便說一句，坐着的時間太長，可以致死。

definition: to lead to death/to result in death
to be crippled (in an accident etc)
to meet violent death/to get killed
to die of illness or injury despite receiving medical help
violent death (idiom); to die in a disaster/an unnatural death
